about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hi, I'm a frontend developer and UX/UI designer who loves crafting clean, accessible, and user-centric web experiences. My work bridges design and development, with a strong focus on usability, performance, and visual clarity.
about.paragraph2: In recent projects, I've been responsible for both the visual and frontend aspects of product development. I build responsive interfaces using Vue 3 and the Quasar framework, and I've also implemented system email features through Laravel. I specialize in turning design concepts into well-structured, maintainable code that supports a smooth user experience.
about.paragraph3: I've contributed to a range of products, including CRM tools, digital twin platforms, IoT dashboards, and e-commerce websites. These experiences have deepened my understanding of how system logic connects to user behavior, and how thoughtful design can bridge that gap.
about.paragraph4: I'm always eager to explore new tools, design systems, and technologies. I stay up-to-date with the latest trends in UX and frontend development, and I enjoy refining products by identifying user pain points and transforming feedback into meaningful improvements.
